thread.title: Trump Briefly Followed 'Emergency Kittens' On Twitter And We All Want To Know Why
thread.title_full: Trump Briefly Followed 'Emergency Kittens' On Twitter And We All Want To Know Why

author: Omar Rimawi
title: Trump Briefly Followed 'Emergency Kittens' On Twitter And We All Want To Know Why
text:
Emergency Kittens is one of Twitter's most popular accounts, and for good reason. Having a kitty pop up on your timeline to break up the stream of apocalypse predictions and images of Putin side eyeing the camera is something we all need, including President-Elect Donald Trump.

2017 definitely started off with a bang amiright? pic.twitter.com/IjoYvz56Fc 
— Emergency Kittens (@EmrgencyKittens) January 2, 2017 
That's the tweet that replaced the initial one that made the masses aware of their very special follower that prompted everyone to ask, "Why?"
What the hell? This is real. Maybe this is good, though. Maybe the kittens will distract him from tweeting insane shit & starting a war?? pic.twitter.com/Y3AezmmDr3 
— Vic Berger IV (@VicBergerIV) January 2, 2017 
Emergency Kittens tried to befriend the President-Elect, but it was too late.
It's a Meowntain. But he unfollowed before the punchline. pic.twitter.com/emcQanPx4Y 
— Emergency Kittens (@EmrgencyKittens) January 2, 2017 
As of now, no reasons were given by Trump's transition team as to why he followed and then unfollowed the pro-feline page.
Breaking: @realDonaldTrump just unfollowed @EmrgencyKittens ! Sad! pic.twitter.com/YgD3XRp2vs 
— (((Roran_Stehl))) (@Roran_Stehl) January 2, 2017 
Maybe he was searching for a new White House pet? I guess we'll have to wait and see.
